medium: Graphite on thin beige wove paper
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
inscribed:
Inscribed verso (visible through mount), bottom center, in
graphite: 48; on mount, lower right corner, in graphite:
several words, erased, and indecipherable: Zborowski 193[6?] /
and in different hand, in graphite: Zboranski [sic]

makers.displaydate: 1884–1920; born Livorno, Italy; died Paris, France
